amendatorysection.para: Sections 38-2801 to 38-28,107 and the Nebraska Drug Product Selection Act shall be known and may be cited as the Pharmacy Practice Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB166, section 9, with LB481, section 1, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB166 became effective April 28, 2017. Changes made by LB481 became operative January 1, 2018.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Drug Product Selection Act, see section 38-28,108.
